segments.text: What did you usually do as a head nurse ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I allocate different patients with their consent to different nurses . And I supervise the primary nurses and help nurses carry out their work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How to maintain a high standard of nursing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To maintain a high standard of nursing , we should take experience and education into consideration while considering a nurse's level of expertise in caring for various patients .
segments.speaker: S2
